sentences.english: Qing hero Zheng Chenggong, recovering around the world to see.
sentences.chinese: 清初英雄郑成功，收复台湾世界见。

sentences.english: Fujian Nan Zheng Chenggong County, a child he was good at thinking, heroic and promising.
sentences.chinese: 郑成功是福建南安县人，他自幼善于思考，英勇有为。
